link_desc:
NetApp cDot Template. Tested on cDot 8.3.x and 9.x with zabbix 3.2.1. If you modify the template Header it should be possible to Import it to zabbix 2.x.

Following stuff is checked with SNMP and triggers are enabled:

  • Cluster Status
  • HDD Status (failed/prefailed disks)
  • Node Status (Eletronic/Fan/PSU failure, Software Status)
  • LLD Rule for Volumes (size, Free space%)
  • LLD Rule for Aggregates (size, free space %)
  • Network LIFs (is Home)

I am trying to update the template in the future with some Values for IOPs and Snapmirror/vault stuff

suggestions/issues:

Zabbix Forum Thread

Update Version 1.2:
- switched OIDs dfKBytesTotal & dfKBytesUsed to df64TotalKBytes & df64UsedKBytes

Update Version 1.1:
- hsoares & Arcocide discovered tirgger names that are not supported, updated them!
author: Michael Weber
